item.description:
This is an opportunity to Step. This is not a Steppers of Boston Event. Please contact Lady Mary Johnson for more info


Friends VI Life
Of Boston
SPRING BASH 2010


April 17, 2010
9pm to 2am
Cover:$15 advance $20 at the door


Russell Auditorium
70 Talbot Avenue, Dorchester, Ma 02124


***Must be 21 or over with Proper Dress and ID***
*** Free Food while it last ***
*** Free Parking ***






For Ticket Information Contact: info@friendsivlifeboston.com
Or visit our website: www.friendsivlifeboston.com

Tony (T LUM) Lumley @ 781-983-7090 Calvin (Red) Cheek @ 617-201-2398

Eric Bradshaw @ 617-212-4411 James (Baldi) Bing @ 617-921-7257

item.name: Steppers Invited to Spring Bash 2010
